statements: SELECT * FROM Vendor
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM Vendor
SELECT vendor_id, contact_person, phone_number FROM Vendor
SELECT * FROM Vendor ORDER BY vendor_name ASC
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM Vendor WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM Vendor ORDER BY vendor_name DESC, email ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT vendor_name, phone_number FROM Vendor WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM Vendor WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_vendors FROM Vendor
SELECT * FROM Vendor WHERE vendor_id = 'a7f627e4-7f25-4a3f-b5a7-4d8a94ef2797'
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_location, vendor_name FROM vendors WHERE vendor_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM ingredients ORDER BY ingredient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE vendor_id = 3;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, vendor_location FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name = 'Acme Corp';
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name FROM vendors WHERE vendor_location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE ingredient_name = 'Flour' AND vendor_id = 3;
SELECT ingredient_name, vendor_name FROM ingredients JOIN vendors ON ingredients.vendor_id = vendors.vendor_id;
SELECT * FROM vendor;
SELECT id, name, location FROM vendor ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, category FROM ingredient WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT name, price FROM menu WHERE price > 10.00;
SELECT id, name, category FROM ingredient WHERE category = 'Vegetables';
SELECT * FROM vendor ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM ingredient;
SELECT name, price FROM menu WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT v.name AS vendor_name, i.name AS ingredient_name, m.name AS menu_name FROM vendor v JOIN ingredient i ON v.id = i.vendor_id JOIN menu m ON i.id = m.ingredient_id;
SELECT v.id AS vendor_id, v.name AS vendor_name, COUNT(m.id) AS num_menus FROM vendor v LEFT JOIN ingredient i ON v.id = i.vendor_id LEFT JOIN menu m ON i.id = m.ingredient_id GROUP BY v.id;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, location FROM vendors WHERE location='New York';
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM vendors JOIN products ON vendors.vendor_id = products.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT products.product_name, inventory.quantity, inventory.price FROM products JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE products.price > 50;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, location FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, product_name, quantity FROM vendors v INNER JOIN products p ON v.vendor_id = p.vendor_id WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC;

SELECT v.vendor_name AS Vendor, p.product_name AS Product, o.quantity AS Quantity FROM vendors v INNER JOIN orders o ON v.vendor_id = o.vendor_id INNER JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id WHERE o.order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, phone_number FROM vendors;
SELECT menu_item_name, price FROM menu_items ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity, unit_of_measure FROM ingredients WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person, phone_number, email_address FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM vendors WHERE email_address LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT menu_item_name, price FROM menu_items WHERE price > 10 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT orders.order_id, orders.order_date, menu_items.menu_item_name, menu_items.price FROM orders JOIN menu_items ON orders.menu_item_id = menu_items.menu_item_id;

SELECT recipes.recipe_name, ingredients.ingredient_name, vendors.vendor_name FROM recipes JOIN ingredients ON recipes.ingredient_id = ingredients.ingredient_id JOIN vendors ON ingredients.vendor_id = vendors.vendor_id ORDER BY vendors.vendor_name ASC;
